蘬蘬蘬
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

蘬字的基本解释

蘬
guī
葵菜。

蘬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuī］
［《廣韻》丘追切，平脂，溪。］
［《廣韻》丘韋切，平微，溪。］
［《廣韻》丘軌切，上旨，溪。］
荭草。一名水荭。
[②]［huǐ］
［《集韻》詡鬼切，上尾，曉。］
同“虺1”。
人名用字。

蘬字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　蘬； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1070第08
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】?丘追切，音巋。【玉篇】大蘢古也。【爾雅·釋草】紅蘢古，其大者蘬。　又【博雅】葵也。　又【說文】薺實也。　又馬蓼，似蓼而大也。【集韻】亦作?。　又【韻會】詡鬼切，音卉。人名。【荀子·堯問篇】其在中蘬之言也。【註】中蘬與仲虺同。

蘬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蘬字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Faint
guī
Sunflower.
Faint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuī]
["Guangyun" Qiu chasing, Pingzhi, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" Qiu Weiqi, Pingwei, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" Qiu track cut, decree, creek. ]
Orientia. A water deer.
[②] [huǐ]
["Jiyun" Xungui cut, upper tail, Akatsuki. ]
Same as "虺1".
Use characters for names.
Faint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　蘬; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1070 Page 08
[Ancient text]? [Tang Yun] [Jiyun]? Qiu chased and cut, Yinkui. [Jade articles] Dachang ancient also. 【Erya·Shucao】The red tea is ancient, and the bigger one is long.　[Bo Ya] Kwai Ye.　[Said the text] Nishiki also.　Ma Liao again, like Liao but also big. [Ji Yun] also made?.　[Yunhui] Xuguiqie, Yinhui. Person's name. [Xunzi·Yaowen Chapter] His words in Zhongzheng are also. [Note] Zhongzheng is the same as Zhongzheng.
